messages.subject: Looking for Ian Bottomley
messages.msgSnippet: Dear folks, Our local arms museum is trying to get in touch with Ian Bottomley, but the e-mail address I have for him is out of date.  Could someone please
messages.messageBody:
Dear folks,

Our local arms museum is trying to get in touch with Ian Bottomley, but
the e-mail address I have for him is out of date. Could someone please
provide me with a current email address privately, please?

Thanks,

Bob

--
Robert J. Gilmore, MS, DVM
<rgilmore82@...> office
<rgilmore@...> home
